alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Yuma County through 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Eckley, or 10 miles west of Wray, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wray. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 235 and 263. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
